DOC.brief_summary: The general aim study determine comparative safety efficacy dabigatran etexilate administer orally warfarin ( International Normalized Ratio ( INR ) 2.0-3.0 ) long-term treatment secondary prevention symptomatic venous thromboembolism patient successfully treated standard dose approve anticoagulant three twelve month confirm acute symptomatic Venous Thrombo-embolism .
DOC.brief_title: Secondary Prevention Venous Thrombo Embolism ( VTE ) .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Inclusion_Criteria Acute symptomatic deep vein thrombosis ( DVT ) Pulmonary embolism ( PE ) 312 month prior screen , document objective test Exclusion criterion : Exclusion_Criteria Symptomatic DVT PE screen Interruption anticoagulant therapy 2 week 312 month treatment prior VTE . Patients investigator judgement perceive excessive risk bleeding Elevated Aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) Alanine tranminase ( ALT ) > 2x ULN Severe renal impairment ( estimate creatinine clearance < = 30 ml/min )
